name: vega-expression
description: Vega expression parser and code generator.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-expression.js -c -m -o build/vega-expression.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g vega-util:vega -n vega -o build/vega-expression.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-expression.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-expression.js build/vega-expression.min.js
